about_the_game:
In the future, you’ve got to play a little dirty if you want to win races. Master hairpin turns across dangerous courses that twist and coil over beautiful galactic backdrops, knocking opponents into the void of space. Kick into hyperdrive with temporary speed boosts and use every opportunity to jump off the paths of the rollercoaster-like tracks. Bypass gates and checkpoints and roll over competitors on the way to first place!

The spiritual sequel to the award-winning Impossible Road is back and more ferocious than ever with all-new modes, 120 FPS local multiplayer, insane online play, and much more! So what’re you waiting for? Crack those knuckles and jump into the fastest, craziest, most spectacular racer you've ever played.

GAME FEATURES:

  • Race with your friends online no matter what console they have! Online cross-play is now available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation, and Apple Arcade.
  • Comprehensive career mode consisting of dozens of varied challenges
  • Cross-platform online races with up to 8 players at once
  • 4-player split-screen
  • Single player modes with leaderboards
  • A new track every day in Daily Track mode
  • Full vehicle customization for boosting stats to suit your playstyle
  • Full surround sound system support
  • Pulsating techno soundtrack
detailed_description:
Now with Cross-platform Multiplayer!

Play the best players around the world, whether they play on console or PC! Up to 8 rivals can race each other worldwide. Vote for the next track location with the track spinner, or choose random or repeat track to liven things up.

So what’re you waiting for? Crack those knuckles and jump into the fastest, craziest, most spectacular racer you've ever played.

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11.x or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650M or equivalent
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11.x or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent

name: Super Impossible Road

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Winning is Cheating in this futuristic racer set on rollercoaster-like tracks. Create shortcuts to cheat your way to the front. Beat a series of varied solo missions of increasing difficulty and then take your skills online in the cross-platform multiplayer, or battle your roomies in split-screen.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
